item.description:
Join us in the charming village of Essex for an artist's reception at the Brick Gallery.

Every third Thursday of the month from 6 - 9 pm, the Brick Gallery in Essex invites you to meet their talented artists and view their latest work. Complimentary food and drink will be available. Let's meet at the Gazebo in the Town Park at 7:00 - very easy to see from the street, and is a quick walk to the gallery. When going down Main Street in Essex Village, the Town Park will be on your right.

If you get lost or can't make it to the Gazebo by 6:30 pm - give me a call on my cell phone 860-759-3932 - and we can let you know where we are.
item.name: Art, Food & Drink in Essex!
